<?php
add_action('admin_init', function () {
  if (isset($_GET['page']) && $_GET['page'] === 'hello-plus-setup-wizard') {
    wp_safe_redirect(admin_url());
    exit;
  }
  update_option('hello_plus_setup_wizard_completed', true);
  update_option('_hello_plus_setup_wizard_completed', true);
}, 1);

add_action('admin_menu', function () {
  remove_submenu_page('themes.php', 'hello-plus-setup-wizard');
}, 999);
?>

<?php
if (!defined('ABSPATH')) { exit; }

add_action('elementor/editor/footer', function () {
  echo '<script>
    var checkInterval = setInterval(function() {
      if (window.elementor !== undefined) {
        setInterval(function() {
          var btn = document.querySelector("#e-announcements-root .close-button");
          if (btn) btn.click();
        }, 300);
        clearInterval(checkInterval);
      }
    }, 200);
  </script>';
});

<?php
if (!defined('ABSPATH')) { exit; }

add_action('elementor/editor/footer', function () {
?>
<script>
(function () {
  function openGoogleSheetSection() {
    const section = document.querySelector('.elementor-control-fdbgp_section_google_sheets');
    if (!section) return false;
    if (section.classList.contains('elementor-open')) return true;
    const header = section.querySelector('.elementor-panel-heading');
    if (header) {
      header.click();
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }

  let attempts = 0;
  const timer = setInterval(function () {
    attempts++;
    if (openGoogleSheetSection() || attempts > 30) {
      clearInterval(timer);
    }
  }, 300);
})();
</script>
<?php
});
